job_title: SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) Intern
job_description:
1.	WRITE AND EXECUTE MANUAL AND AUTOMATED TEST CASES. 
2.	INTEGRATE AUTOMATED TESTS INTO CI/CD PIPELINES (JENKINS, GITHUB ACTIONS, OR GITLAB CI/CD)
3.	IDENTIFY, DOCUMENT, AND REPORT SOFTWARE BUGS USING JIRA
4.	COLLABORATE WITH SOFTWARE ENGINEERS AND QA TEAMS TO ENHANCE TEST COVERAGE
5.	STAY UPDATED ON THE LATEST TESTING TOOLS, TECHNIQUES, AND BEST PRACTICES
position_type: SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) Intern
